mapper.select: SELECT tb.tip_id, m.nickname, tb.title, tb.content, tb.created_at, tb.deleted FROM tip_board tb LEFT JOIN `member` m ON tb .user_id = m.user_id ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageNumber}, 20

SELECT tb.tip_id, m.nickname, tb.title, tb.content, tb.created_at, tb.deleted FROM tip_board tb LEFT JOIN `member` m ON tb .user_id = m.user_id WHERE tb.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageNumber}, 20
